Package de.elo.ix.client

Class FindDirect

java.lang.Object
de.elo.ix.client.FindDirect
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
@Deprecated
public class FindDirect
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Deprecated.

Search query for locating text in the archive.

The fulltext search is performed via iSearch. Therefore, use FindByESearch instead. The query should be replaces by the actual query term and additional filters (e.g. DocMask) should be submitted by ESearchParams.queryOperator. The areas in which should be search should be set in ESearchParams.searchIn.
Searches using this class are still executed but internally mapped to FindByESearch objects and some values might be ignored.

See Also:
Serialized Form
